Regional Mexican singer/songwriter Eden is solidifying his place among the top Mexican music artist, with approximately 12 million monthly listeners on Spotify, over 5 million followers on Facebook, 4 million on Instagram, and more than 5.5 million on TikTok. Back to All Shows


The Australian Pink Floyd Show

Saturday, August 8, 2026

8:00 pm


BUY TICKETS 


Performing the music of Pink Floyd with note for note perfection, The Australian Pink Floyd Show (TAPFS) has been astonishing audiences worldwide for more than three decades. Always striving to reproduce the complete Pink Floyd experience and bring the music to new audiences, the show continues to include a stunning light and laser show, video animations, state of the art, high resolution LED screen technology, and other special effects. In addition, and in true Pink Floyd fashion, there are several huge inflatables, including a giant pig and their own unique Pink Kangaroo. 
TAPFS has worked with Pink Floyd touring musicians like Guy Pratt and Durga McBroom. Lorelei McBroom, who was a member of the Pink Floyd touring band on both the Momentary Lapse of Reason and the Delicate Sound of Thunder tours has been a member of TAPFS for more than 15 years. 
Often described as being much more than a tribute band, The Australian Pink Floyd Show is the first Pink Floyd tribute show that took the concept into the worldwide arena circuit. The band has played to sell-out audiences throughout Europe, UK, America, Canada & South America. With more than 35 years of history, the world’s biggest, best and greatest Pink Floyd tribute show continues to delight its global fan base.

Having performed for more than a decade across North America and around the world, including RushCon, RTP stands as one of the premiere tributes to this legendary rock ‘n’ roll power trio.

title: Leonid & Friends 2026 Tour
description:
Back to All Shows


Emporium Presents
Leonid & Friends 2026 Tour

Saturday, November 7, 2026

7:30 pm


BUY TICKETS 


Leonid & Friends is a globally acclaimed, genre-defying 11-piece collective renowned for their astonishingly precise recreations of classic Chicago songs, as well as high-energy performances of other rock, pop, and jazz-fusion hits from the 1970s. Formed by multi-talented musician and producer Leonid Vorobyev, the group features elite vocalists and instrumentalists from Russia, Ukraine, Moldova, and beyond, all united by a shared passion for celebrating this iconic era of music. 
Originally conceived as a studio project in Moscow, Leonid & Friends skyrocketed to international fame when their note-perfect video covers went viral online, earning praise from members of Chicago themselves. What began as a YouTube phenomenon has since evolved into a world-class touring act, captivating audiences across North America, Europe, and Asia. 
With more than 500 million combined video views, multiple sold-out U.S. tours, and a devoted global fanbase, the band is beloved worldwide for honoring the classics, while expanding far beyond them 


After-show Meet & Greet
Meet & Greet is a wonderful opportunity for fans to meet and interact with Leonid & Friends. Quantity is limited at each show. Shortly after the concert, attendees with a M&G wristband will be allowed to meet the band, have a group photo taken, and the opportunity to chat with band members and have merchandise or memorabilia signed.


Platinum Tickets are tickets that are dynamically priced up and down based on demand. Platinum Tickets are not part of VIP packages – they are tickets only. 
Platinum Seating provides fans with direct access to securing some of the best seats in the venue at market value. The market value for Platinum Seating is subject to change based on the overall demand and popularity for the event.  Platinum Seating allows fans to purchase tickets in a safe and secure environment without running the risk of purchasing tickets that may be considered lost, stolen, or counterfeit. 



THIRD PARTY RESELLERS
Don’t get taken by deceptive online resellers who use bots to buy tickets and then mark up their prices. The only safe way to protect your purchase and guarantee the best seats at the lowest cost is to work directly with us: through our website, by phone, or at our box office in Santa Rosa. Plus, we’re not bots. Our friendly team members are easily accessible by phone or at the box office to provide customer support.

Source: Luther Burbank Center
